short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Copy text and images with freedom, allowing users to overcome restrictions originally enforced by a site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
A delighted Chrome extension to allow users to copy from sites with freedom

Tired of websites preventing you from copying text, images or, even worse, your own content? Well, those days are over with the help of CopyWrite!

CopyWrite has a simple and intuitive to get you back to copying and pasting content as your heart desires.

This re-enables user's favourite copy/paste functionality from websites like Teams, Instagram, the Washington Post, Confluence and more!
